results.name: Möbius transform of A324118, where A324118(n) = A000593(A156552(n)).
comment: The first three zeros after a(1) occur at n = 192, 288, 3645.
The first negative term is a(150) = -1. There are 184 negative terms among the first 4473 terms.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..4473
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
A324118(n) = if(1==n, 0, my(v); if(mapisdefined(memoA324118,n,&v), v, v=sigma(A322993(n)); mapput(memoA324118,n,v); (v)));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 07 2019
